email_subject: MARKET ALERT: Nasdaq Composite Ends Down 3.7%
email_body: MARKET ALERT from The Wall Street Journal December 13, 2000 The Nasdaq composite dropped 108.31, or 3.7%, to 2823.46 Wednesday as investors turned their attention to earnings warnings. The market couldn't sustain initial enthusiasm that the election drama was nearing a close, but the Dow industrials finished up 26.17 at 10794.44.
